metadata.title: CVE-2014-1882 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Apache Cordova 3.3.0 and earlier and Adobe PhoneGap 2.9.0 and earlier allowremote attackers to bypass intended device-resource restrictions of anevent-based bridge via a crafted library clone that leverages IFRAME scriptexecution and directly accesses bridge JavaScript objects, as demonstratedby certain cordova.require calls.

criterions.comment: cordova-ubuntu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
